column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I love this product!  I have used many other acne treatments, and nothing has cleared up my skin like Prascion RA.  Most other products leave my skin red, dry, and flaking.  This product doesn't do any of that to me.  I use a little bit all over my face, and haven't had any pimples in over a year.  It is also covered by my insurance.

column9: After using as perscribed by Dermatologist my face became red, itchy and swollen. It's cost is outrageous & my insurance didn't cover it, but my face required something so I bought it. My face is much worse, now.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I developed adult acne or rosacia at the age of 56 after years of blemish free skin. It took doctors to get me this medicine which is covered by my insurance, easy to use and has my skin looking ten years younger.

column9: Works perfectly. I use it only when I have flare ups. It heals the ugly pimples I get around my nose almost overnight.

column2: yznhymer, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: It has worked well for rosacea, a little less well for acne, and very well for seb dermatitis.  I love that it contains sunscreen. I use it over another med and it takes a bit to spread it around.

column2: suedee865@aol.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: After 6 hours of using this my face became red and inflamed. Itching/burning and swelling began overnight.  My skin is sore to touch and look like I have been in the sun without sunscreen for many hours.
